Stagville December 2d 1808
88| Jesse Hunter Self Dr
| 2 ~ Sugar 4/- 1 ~ Copperas 1/6 1 qut Whisky 3/- ||8|6|

88| James Haley Self Dr
2| 1/2 Bushel Salt 10/- ||10||

88| James Daniel Self Dr
2| 1/4 doz Gunflints d6 |||6|
5| 1 quart Whisky 3/- ||3||
8| 1 Paper Pins 4/- ||4||
21| 1 Sack Bag 10/- 1/2 Bushel Salt 10/- |1|||
24| 1 qt Whisky 3/- 1 Qt Brandy 4/ ||7||
|1|14|6|

88| James Wicker Self Dr
| 1 penknife 4/6 1 pr Chest Hinges 2/- Octo 31st ||6|6|
| 1 qt Whisky 3/- pr [Lewis?] Nov. 23d ||3||
| 1 qt Whisky 3/- PP J Daniel Nov 28th ||3||
| 1 case & 2 Razors 22/ 1 Shaving Box 3/6 |1|5|6|
1 Glass 2/- by J Phipps Nov 30 ||2||
2| 1 Pocket Book 12/6 1 Almanac 1/- ||13|6|
2| Cash paid him $8 |4|||
23 Cash paid him by M Wadkins |3|||
24| 1 qt Whisky 3/- 1 pt Brandy 2/- by George ||5||
|9|18|6|

88| John Close Self Dr.
| 1 chest lock & Hinges 6/- Nov 4th ||6||
2| 1 yd C Cambrick 13/6 1 penknife 4/ ||17|6|
2| Cash pd 20/- PP M Wadkins |1|||
23| [scratched out] 1 Hat for M Watkins 40/ |2|||
23| Cash pd M. Wadkins |1|||
24| 1 qt Whisky 3/- 1 pt Brandy 2/- pd George ||5||
